references.paper_title: Fast-detectgpt: Efficient zero-shot detection of machine-generated text via conditional probability curvature
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel zero-shot detection method that is both efficient and effective in identifying machine-generated text, which is a significant contribution to the field.

references.paper_title: Plagiarism meets paraphrasing: Insights for the next generation in automatic plagiarism detection
references.reason: This paper provides valuable insights into the challenges of detecting plagiarism and paraphrasing, which are relevant to the task of identifying machine-generated text.

references.paper_title: Computer-generated text detection using machine learning: A systematic review
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of existing machine learning techniques for detecting computer-generated text, which serves as a foundation for the current study.

references.paper_title: GLTR: Statistical detection and visualization of generated text
references.reason: This paper introduces GLTR, a tool that is widely used for detecting and visualizing generated text, which is directly compared to the current approach in this paper.

references.paper_title: Spotting LLMs with binoculars: Zero-shot detection of machine-generated text
references.reason: This paper presents a novel zero-shot detection method for machine-generated text, demonstrating a significant improvement over existing techniques.
